title: can't play with mac
body: It's so sad that I can't play the game with mac. I can login in the game, but everything are black except the top line. I can't open the store, can't see the game history, can't begin the game. All in a word, I can't do anything except to login in the game. I have tried to change the DNS, to check my system reference and everything I can do, but it didn't work. I have found there are a lot of people having this problem like me. I hope there are some solutions that could help us.

replies.body:
I play on a MBP laptop and not seeing this issue, I can verify we are running the same client version too, based on your screenshots.

What OSX are you running on? (I am on Yosemite)

Maybe your mac requires an update or driver update?
